title: Combat Response
description: JSON schema for responses from Combat prompts

userFacingText.description: Narrative description of the turn events to be shown to the player

currentEnemySuccesses.description: Current number of successful hits on the enemy

playerConditions.description: List of all current player conditions

combatEnded.description: Indicates if the combat has concluded

playerVictory.description: Indicates if the player won (true) or was defeated (false)
